text: Babahoyo (), founded September 30, 1948, is the capital of the Los Ríos province of Ecuador. About 153,000 people live there. It is bordered by two rivers, the San Pablo and the Caracol. ==Other websites== * Official Website of Babahoyo (Spanish) Category:Cities in Ecuador Category:Capitals of Ecuadorian provinces Category:Los Ríos Province
title: Babahoyo
